device.description: Select computing device for Tensorflow (-1 for CPU, 0 for first CUDA GPU etc.). Downgraded to CPU if not available.

checkpoint_dir.description: The directory (name or path) containing Calamari model files (*.ckpt.json). Will use all checkpoints in that directory.

textequiv_level.description: Deepest PAGE XML hierarchy level to include TextEquiv results for

glyph_conf_cutoff.description: Only include glyph alternatives with confidences above this threshold

resources.name: antiqua_historical
resources.description: Antiqua parts of GT4HistOCR from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, normalized grayscale, NFC)

resources.name: antiqua_historical_ligs
resources.description: Antiqua parts of GT4HistOCR with enriched ligatures from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, normalized grayscale, NFC)

resources.name: fraktur_19th_century
resources.description: Fraktur 19th century parts of GT4HistOCR mixed with Fraktur data from Archiscribe and jze from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, normalized grayscale and nlbin, NFC)

resources.name: fraktur_historical
resources.description: Fraktur parts of GT4HistOCR from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, normalized grayscale, NFC)

resources.name: fraktur_historical_ligs
resources.description: Fraktur parts of GT4HistOCR with enriched ligatures from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, normalized grayscale, NFC)

resources.name: gt4histocr
resources.description: GT4HistOCR from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, normalized grayscale, NFC)

resources.name: historical_french
resources.description: 17-19th century French prints from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC)

resources.name: idiotikon
resources.description: Antiqua UW3 finetuned on Antiqua Idiotikon dictionary with many diacritics from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFD)

resources.name: uw3-modern-english
resources.description: Antiqua UW3 corpus from Calamari-OCR/calamari_models (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC)

resources.name: deep3_fraktur19
resources.description: Model trained on 19th century German Fraktur, like zpd-fraktur19 but deeper (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=0.5%

resources.name: deep3_fraktur-hist
resources.description: Model trained on 16th to 19th century German Fraktur, like fraktur-historical but deeper (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=0.9%

resources.name: deep3_antiqua-hist
resources.description: Model trained on 16th to 19th century Antiqua, like antiqua-historical but deeper (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=0.5%

resources.name: deep3_antiqua-15-16-cent
resources.description: Model trained on 15th and 16th century Latin Antiqua, like zpd-latin-script-hist-3 but deeper (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=0.5%

resources.name: deep3_lsh4
resources.description: Model trained on 15th and 19th century on German, Latin, French etc. in Antiqua and Fraktur, like gt4histocr but deeper (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=1.6%

resources.name: deep3_htr-bastard
resources.description: Model trained on 13th to 16th century German Gothic Bastarda (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=6.7%

resources.name: deep3_htr-gothic
resources.description: Model trained on 13th to 16th century German Gothic Cursiva (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=2.5%

resources.name: def_arabic
resources.description: Model trained for Arabic on ? (5-fold ensemble, nlbin, NFC) - val_CER=1.2%
